mapper.insert: insert into class (name, rate, origin, description, video_url, post_url,class_type,join_time)values (#{name},#{rate},#{origin}, #{description}, #{videoUrl}, #{postUrl},#{classType},#{joinTime})
mapper.select: select video_url from class where id=#{id}
select post_url from class where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update class set comments_num=comments_num+1 where id=#{id}
update class set likes=likes+1 where id=#{id}
update class set video_url=#{param2} where id=#{param1}
